properties.name: jwt.auth.secret
properties.description: JWT secret key for signing tokens.

properties.name: jwt.auth.redis-key-prefix
properties.description: Redis key prefix for JWT tokens.

properties.name: jwt.auth.enable-refresh-token
properties.description: Whether to enable refresh token functionality.

properties.name: jwt.auth.enable-blacklist
properties.description: Whether to enable token blacklist functionality.

properties.name: jwt.auth.max-concurrent-sessions
properties.description: Maximum concurrent sessions per user (0 for unlimited).

properties.name: jwt.auth.token-header-name
properties.description: HTTP header name for JWT token.

properties.name: jwt.auth.enable-default-controller
properties.description: Whether to enable default authentication controller.
